Name: Monsters and Weapons
About the game: Monsters and Weapons A strategic rogue-like based on decision making. Fight your way through different areas, buy items and defeat the final boss to proclaim victory! Highly strategic. Unique 'semi' turn-based fights where you control the pace. Ten unlockable and unique classes. Achievements (hard). Impactful decisions with a smidge of luck. Unlock Legendary Mode for the ultimate challenge! Inventory management. Boss fights. Many items and creative item combinations.
